data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Picea mariana (Black spruce) from sample COATSUFE-52

Exposition SW, Slope 3 deg, Geology: Granit mit wenig Sand und Kies, av. Tree height 15 m, Tree cover 30%, Shrub cover 55%, Herb cover 80%, Moss cover 80%, Vegatation type: Lock. PCMA-Wald mit viel Equisetum,feucht, Film number: 838A
